# The `ARCOptAddrMode.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This pass folds LD/ST + ADD pairs into Pre/Post-increment form of load/store instructions. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This pass folds LD/ST + ADD pairs into Pre/Post-increment form of load/store instructions.

<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// prohibit this:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   v1 = add v0, c</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">    int64&#95;t Amount;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BasePos, OffPos;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="#abf2ff88815aa54de8727677906950e06">isAddConstantOp</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, Amount)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal">      NewOffset += Amount;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="#a5280589b9d2b6f2ebe876a261ba03879">isValidIncrementOffset</a>(NewOffset) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal">      BasePos = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="normal">      OffPos = 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
